org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSCrypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSCrypto

  • public class EncFSCrypto
extends Object
    Class containing static methods implementing crypto functionality for the rest of the library

    • Method Detail

      • newMac

        public static Mac newMac(Key key)
                  throws InvalidKeyException,
                         EncFSUnsupportedException
        Create a new Mac object for the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to create a new Mac for.
        Returns:
        New Mac object.
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException - Passed key is not valid
        EncFSUnsupportedException - HMAC SHA-1 not supported by this runtime

      • newKey

        public static Key newKey(byte[] keyBytes)
        Creates a new AES key with the given key bytes.
        Parameters:
        keyBytes - Key data.
        Returns:
        New AES key.

      • newStreamCipher

        public static Cipher newStreamCipher()
                              throws EncFSUnsupportedException
        Returns a new stream cipher with AES/CFB/NoPadding.
        Returns:
        A new Cipher object.
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException - AES/CFB/NoPadding not supported by this runtime

      • newBlockCipher

        public static Cipher newBlockCipher()
                             throws EncFSUnsupportedException
        Returns a new block cipher with AES/CBC/NoPadding.
        Returns:
        A new Cipher object.
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException - AES/CBC/NoPadding not supported by this runtime

      • cipherInit

        public static void cipherInit(EncFSVolume volume,
              int opMode,
              Cipher cipher,
              byte[] ivSeed)
                       throws InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Initialize the given cipher for a volume with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume to initialize the cipher for
        opMode - Operation mode of the cipher
        cipher - Cipher object
        ivSeed - IV seed for initialization
        Throws:
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Inappropriate algorithm parameters

      • derivePasswordKey

        public static byte[] derivePasswordKey(EncFSConfig config,
                       String password)
                                throws EncFSInvalidConfigException,
                                       EncFSUnsupportedException
        Derive password-based key from input/config parameters using PBKDF2
        Parameters:
        config - Volume configuration
        password - Volume password
        Returns:
        Derived PBKDF2 key + IV bits
        Throws:
        EncFSInvalidConfigException - Unable to decode salt bytes
        EncFSUnsupportedException - PBKDF2WithHmacSHA1 not supported by current runtime

      • decryptVolumeKey

        public static byte[] decryptVolumeKey(EncFSConfig config,
                      byte[] pbkdf2Data)
                               throws EncFSChecksumException,
                                      EncFSInvalidConfigException,
                                      EncFSCorruptDataException,
                                      EncFSUnsupportedException
        Derive volume key for the given config and password-based key/IV data
        Parameters:
        config - Volume configuration
        pbkdf2Data - PBKDF2 key material + IV (from derivePasswordKey())
        Returns:
        Volume key + IV bits
        Throws:
        EncFSChecksumException - Volume key checksum mismatch
        EncFSInvalidConfigException - Can't decode encoded key string
        EncFSCorruptDataException - Corrupt data in config file
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Stream cipher mode unsupported in current runtime

      • encryptVolumeKey

        public static byte[] encryptVolumeKey(EncFSConfig config,
                      byte[] pbkdf2Data,
                      byte[] volKeyData)
                               throws EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                      EncFSInvalidConfigException,
                                      EncFSCorruptDataException
        Derive volume key for the given config and password-based key/IV data
        Parameters:
        config - Volume configuration
        pbkdf2Data - PBKDF2 key material + IV (from derivePasswordKey())
        Returns:
        Volume key + IV bits
        Throws:
        EncFSInvalidConfigException - Corrupt data in config file
        EncFSCorruptDataException - Corrupt data in config file
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Stream cipher mode unsupported in current runtime

      • encodeVolumeKey

        public static void encodeVolumeKey(EncFSConfig config,
                   String password,
                   byte[] volKey)
                            throws EncFSInvalidConfigException,
                                   EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                   EncFSCorruptDataException
        Encodes the given volume key using the supplied password parameters, placing it into the EncFSConfig
        Parameters:
        config - Partially initialized volume configuration
        password - Password to use for encoding the key
        volKey - Volume key to encode
        Throws:
        EncFSInvalidConfigException - Corrupt data in config file
        EncFSCorruptDataException - Corrupt data in config file
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Stream cipher mode unsupported in current runtime

      • streamDecode

        public static byte[] streamDecode(EncFSVolume volume,
                  byte[] ivSeed,
                  byte[] data)
                           throws EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                  InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                  IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                  BadPaddingException
        Decode the given data using stream mode
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume for the data
        ivSeed - IV seed for the decryption
        data - Encrypted data contents
        Returns:
        Decrypted (plaintext) data
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Unsupported IV seed length
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid algorithm parameters
        IllegalBlockSizeException - Illegal block size
        BadPaddingException - Pad padding in input

      • streamDecode

        public static byte[] streamDecode(EncFSVolume volume,
                  byte[] ivSeed,
                  byte[] data,
                  int offset,
                  int len)
                           throws EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                  InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                  IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                  BadPaddingException
        Decode the given data using stream mode
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume for the data
        ivSeed - IV seed for the decryption
        data - Encrypted data contents
        offset - Offset into the data buffer to decode from
        len - Number of bytes in the data buffer to decode
        Returns:
        Decrypted (plaintext) data
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Unsupported IV seed length
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid algorithm parameters
        IllegalBlockSizeException - Illegal block size
        BadPaddingException - Pad padding in input

      • streamEncode

                  byte[] ivSeed,
                  byte[] data)
                           throws EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                  InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                  IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                  BadPaddingException
        Encode the given data using stream mode
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume for the data
        ivSeed - IV seed for the encryption
        data - Plaintext data contents
        Returns:
        Encrypted (ciphertext) data
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Unsupported IV seed length
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid algorithm parameters
        IllegalBlockSizeException - Illegal block size
        BadPaddingException - Pad padding in input

      • streamEncode

        public static byte[] streamEncode(EncFSVolume volume,
                  byte[] ivSeed,
                  byte[] data,
                  int offset,
                  int len)
                           throws EncFSUnsupportedException,
                                  InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                                  IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                  BadPaddingException
        Encode the given data using stream mode
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume for the data
        ivSeed - IV seed for the encryption
        data - Plaintext data contents
        offset - Offset into the data buffer to start encoding from
        len - Length of the data in the data buffer to encode
        Returns:
        Encrypted (ciphertext) data
        Throws:
        EncFSUnsupportedException - Unsupported IV seed length
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - Invalid algorithm parameters
        IllegalBlockSizeException - Illegal block size
        BadPaddingException - Pad padding in input

      • decodeName

        public static String decodeName(EncFSVolume volume,
                String fileName,
                String volumePath)
                         throws EncFSCorruptDataException,
                                EncFSChecksumException
        Decode the given fileName under the given volume and volume path
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume hosting the file
        fileName - Encrypted file name
        volumePath - Cleartext path of the file in the volume
        Returns:
        Decrypted file name
        Throws:
        EncFSCorruptDataException - Corrupt data in input name
        EncFSChecksumException - File checksum mismatch

      • encodeName

        public static String encodeName(EncFSVolume volume,
                String fileName,
                String volumePath)
                         throws EncFSCorruptDataException
        Encode the given fileName under the given volume and volume path
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume hosting the file
        fileName - Cleartext file name
        volumePath - Cleartext path of the file in the volume
        Returns:
        Encrypted file name
        Throws:
        EncFSCorruptDataException - Corrupt data in config file

      • encodePath

        public static String encodePath(EncFSVolume volume,
                String pathName,
                String volumePath)
                         throws EncFSCorruptDataException
        Encode a given path under the given volume and volume path
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume hosting the path
        pathName - Cleartext name of the path to encode (relative to volumePath)
        volumePath - Cleartext volume path containing the path to encode
        Returns:
        Encrypted path
        Throws:
        EncFSCorruptDataException - Corrupt data in config file

      • mac64

        protected static byte[] mac64(Mac mac,
           byte[] input,
           int inputOffset)
        Compute 64-bit MAC over the given input bytes
        Parameters:
        mac - MAC object to use
        input - Input bytes
        inputOffset - Offset into 'input' to start computing MAC from
        Returns:
        Computed 64-bit MAC result

      • mac64

        protected static byte[] mac64(Mac mac,
           byte[] input,
           int inputOffset,
           int inputLen)
        Compute 64-bit MAC over the given input bytes
        Parameters:
        mac - MAC object to use
        input - Input bytes
        inputOffset - Offset into 'input' to start computing MAC from
        inputLen - Number of bytes to compute MAC for
        Returns:
        Computed 64-bit MAC result
